title: Website design & build.
text1: This is a landing page design and build that I've done for an IT support company. I gave their brand a fresh new look and updated their color palette to something that says all systems are up and running, as that's what one would want from an IT support.
text2: I have used custom illustrations to give a page more personal feel and less stocky, generic look. The goal was to combine friendly, local support with modern and top notch without making it look corporate or mom-and-pop kind of business.
